org.elasticsearch.index.deletionpolicy

Class SnapshotIndexCommit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.index.IndexCommit
      • org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.IndexCommitDelegate
        • org.elasticsearch.index.deletionpolicy.SnapshotIndexCommit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Comparable<org.apache.lucene.index.IndexCommit>, Releasable

    public class SnapshotIndexCommit
extends IndexCommitDelegate
implements Releasable
    A snapshot index commit point. While this is held and close() was not called, no files will be deleted that relates to this commit point (IndexCommitDelegate.getFileNames()).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.IndexCommitDelegate

        delegate

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Releases the current snapshot, returning true if it was actually released.
      void delete()
      Override the delete operation, and only actually delete it if it is not held by the SnapshotDeletionPolicy.
      String[] getFiles()
